body:
Comment 1 by **mikesamuel**: 
A shorter test.  The below run in the playground prints "false, true", but I expect it
to print "true, true".


package main

import (
	"fmt"
	"math"
)

func main() {
        z := float64(0)
	nz := -z
	fmt.Printf("%t, %t\n", math.Signbit(-float64(0)), math.Signbit(nz))
}
